statements: DELETE FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 AND sales_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500;
DELETE FROM reports WHERE report_name = 'Quarterly Report';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE product_id = 'f9f7a4ea-1579-49ad-b4d8-5f5977c784e3' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM reviews WHERE review_text = 'Great product and service'
